result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Haithem A Assad

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Per Judge Piontek:  Bond from this file can be held in 13CF171 and/or 13CF1062 to be applied to fines/costs at sentencing.

Defendant Haithem A Assad in court with attorney Patrick Kiernan Cafferty.  Jennifer C. Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter:  Rose Coulthart.
State moves to amend Ct. 1 in 13CF171 to PTHC/RO as a Class I Felony and moves to dismiss the RO enhancer in 13CF1062.
Plea:
13CF171:  Ct. 1 - NC.
13CF1062:  Ct. 1 - NC.
BTC:
13CF171:  Ct. 1 - GUILTY.
13CF1062:  Ct. 1 - GUITLY.
14CF654:  DRI.
PSI ordered.

Defendant Haithem A Assad in court with attorney Patrick K Cafferty.  Jennifer C Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Kim Slaasted.
Defense asks for the newest file be set for JT  Status conference scheduled for October 7, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference on July 18, 2014 at 08:15 am.
Waiver of Preliminary hearing filed.  Probable cause found;  bound over.

Defendant Haithem A Assad in court with attorney Patrick K Cafferty.  Jennifer C Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Lori Thornton. Waiver not contingent on any offer.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 18, 2014 at 08:15 am.
Preliminary hearing on June 4, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:  No contact with the co-defendant R.G.  It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance.  Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Haithem A Assad in court with attorney Patrick K Cafferty.  Christopher D Steenrod appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Lori Thornton. Defense atty moves to dismiss due to lack of probable cause.  Reading of complaint is waived, probable cause found, bond set. Defense requests that bond be modified to a lower amount of cash. The State objects.
BTC: Motion Denied
Mod bond to  $2000 cash bond. No drg, codef. R.G.
 Finding of good cause to waive time limits.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 4, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on May 14, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Charges per attached criminal complaint. Conditions:    It is a condition of this bond that the defendant NOT consume or possess any controlled substances.  This is to be monitored by random UA's and/or breathalyzers.  The defendant is to report directly to Zimmerman Consulting Inc. (ZCI) for monitoring - report to 524 Main Street, Suite 302, Racine, WI  53403 (third floor of the Monument Square Building) or call (262)632-1780 to immediately schedule an appointment.   The defendant is further ordered to report for testing after each court appearance. Failure to appear will result in the issuance of a warrant for your arrest, possible bail jumping charges and forfeiture of any bond on deposit.

Defendant Haithem A Assad in court.  Jennifer C Tanck-Adams appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Reporter: Pat Phinisee. Bond set. Defendant states that he posted $10,000 in the jail. Defense atty had a misunderstanding about the court date. 
BTC: ADJ  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 14, 2014 at 01:30 pm.
